Package com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation

Class SimCRDTManager<T extends AbstractDataType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cyberfront.crdt.CRDTManager
      • com.cyberfront.crdt.GenericCRDTManager<T>
        • com.cyberfront.crdt.sample.simulation.SimCRDTManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of object this SimCRDTManager is managing
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    IManager<T>, java.lang.Comparable<SimCRDTManager<T>>
    public class SimCRDTManager<T extends AbstractDataType>
extends GenericCRDTManager<T>
implements java.lang.Comparable<SimCRDTManager<T>>, IManager<T>
    The Class SimCRDTManager is used to manage a Plain Old Java Object (POJO). Internally changes are represented as a series of JSON operations but to the external interface, the object type being managed is given by the generic parameter T

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger
      The Constant logger.
      private java.util.UUID managerId
      This is a reference to the node which owns this CRDT instance and is responsible for getting messages delivered to this instance.
      private java.util.UUID objectId
      The id of the object this CRDT manager is associated with.
      private java.util.UUID ownerId
      The UUID associated with the node which owns this CRDT instance and which is responsible for approving / rejecting operations.
      private java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> received
      List of operations and the associated metadata this SimCRDTManager received
      private java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> sent
      List of operations and the associated metadata this SimCRDTManager sent

      • SimCRDTManager

        public SimCRDTManager​(java.util.UUID objectId,
                      java.util.UUID ownerNodeId,
                      java.util.UUID managerNodeId,
                      java.lang.Class<T> objectClass)
        Instantiates a new CRDT manager.
        Parameters:
        objectId - ID of the object being shadowed with the CRDT
        ownerNodeId - Reference to the node which owns this CRDT manager instance
        managerNodeId - Reference to the node which manages this CRDT manager instance
        objectClass - A Class reference used to transform between JSON and POJO representations of the object being managed

      • deliverPendingCreate

        private java.util.Collection<SimOperationManager<T>> deliverPendingCreate​(SimOperationManager<T> mgr,
                                                                          java.lang.Double pReject)
        Deliver a operation manager with a PENDING CREATE operation
        Parameters:
        mgr - Operation Manager to deliver to this CRDT manager
        pReject - Probability of rejecting an update
        Returns:
        The collection of operation managers resulting from processing the one provided. This primarily be a list of no more than two operation, one a REJECT notice and the other an APPROVED notice

                                                                          java.lang.Double pReject)

        Parameters:
        mgr - Operation Manager to deliver to this CRDT manager
        pReject - Probability of rejecting the UPDATE operation
        Returns:

        Parameters:
        mgr - Operation Manager to deliver to this CRDT manager
        pReject - Probability of rejecting the delete operation at the manager node
        Returns:
        The collection of operation managers resulting from processing the one provided. This primarily be a list of no more than two operation, one a REJECT notice and the other an APPROVED notice

        Returns:

      • buildMessages

        private java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> buildMessages​(java.util.Collection<SimOperationManager<T>> mgrs)
        Builds the known messages derived from the operations presented in the collection
        Parameters:
        mgrs - The collection of operations to ensure are applied to the each of the Nodes in the distributed model
        Returns:
        The collection of messages to deliver the operations to each of the other nodes in the distributed architecture

      • buildMessages

        private java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> buildMessages​(SimOperationManager<T> mgr)
        Builds the known messages for a single operation
        Parameters:
        mgr - The operation for which to generate a collection of messages for all of the nodes
        Returns:
        The collection of messages resulting from the distribution of the single operation given

      • push

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> push​(Message<T> msg,
                                                                      java.lang.Double pReject)
        Push the message given into the CRDT so its operation can be extracted and presented to actual CRDT
        Parameters:
        msg - Messsage to process at this node
        pReject - Probability of rejecting the delivered operation if this CRDT manager is locally managed
        Returns:
        The collection of messages to deliver to the each of the other nodes and which are derived from processing the message delivered in this call to the method

      • generateCreate

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateCreate​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                                                                                long timestamp)
        Generate a CREATE operation and wrap it with a collection of messages such that each operation is delivered to each of the recipient nodes
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation which should be PENDING for operations not generated on locally managed CRDTs, or APPROVED for those that are
        timestamp - Timestamp for marking the operation
        Returns:
        The list of messages generated as a result of producing a new CREATE operation which needs to be moved to each of the other nodes.

      • generateRead

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateRead​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                                                                              long timestamp)
        Generate a READ operation and wrap it with a collection of messages such that each operation is delivered to each of the recipient nodes
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation which should be PENDING for operations not generated on locally managed CRDTs, or APPROVED for those that are
        timestamp - Timestamp for marking the operation
        Returns:
        The list of messages generated as a result of producing a new READ operation which needs to be moved to each of the other nodes.

      • generateUpdate

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateUpdate​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                                                                                long timestamp,
                                                                                java.lang.Double pChange)
        Generate a UPDATE operation and wrap it with a collection of messages such that each operation is delivered to each of the recipient nodes
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation which should be PENDING for operations not generated on locally managed CRDTs, or APPROVED for those that are
        timestamp - Timestamp for marking the operation
        pChange - The probability of changing a particular field in the managed object
        Returns:
        The list of messages generated as a result of producing a new UPDATE operation which needs to be moved to each of the other nodes.

      • generateUpdate

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateUpdate​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                                                                                long timestamp,
                                                                                T update)
        Generate a UPDATE operation and wrap it with a collection of messages such that each operation is delivered to each of the recipient nodes
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation which should be PENDING for operations not generated on locally managed CRDTs, or APPROVED for those that are
        timestamp - Timestamp for marking the operation
        update - The object which is used to generate the difference for the update operation payload
        Returns:
        The list of messages generated as a result of producing a new UPDATE operation which needs to be moved to each of the other nodes.

      • generateDelete

        public java.util.Collection<Message<? extends AbstractDataType>> generateDelete​(OperationManager.StatusType status,
                                                                                long timestamp)
        Generate a DELETE operation and wrap it with a collection of messages such that each operation is delivered to each of the recipient nodes
        Parameters:
        status - Status of the operation which should be PENDING for operations not generated on locally managed CRDTs, or APPROVED for those that are
        timestamp - Timestamp for marking the operation
        Returns:
        The list of messages generated as a result of producing a new DELETE operation which needs to be moved to each of the other nodes.

      • buildReport

        private java.lang.String buildReport()
        This routine constructs a string to display the current state of the CRDT, all of its messages received and all of the operations it holds. It primarily contains summary data, though it does include a JSON base representation of the CRDT as well.
        Returns:
        String containing a JSON formated report of summary and detailed information related to this CRDT instance

      • filterOperationsByType

        public static java.util.Collection<Operation> filterOperationsByType​(java.util.Collection<Operation> opList,
                                                                     Operation.OperationType opType,
                                                                     boolean criteria)
        Filter a collection of operations given the operation type. Based on the value of the criteria argument, this can be used to perform a positive filter (all operations perform have the given operation type) or a negative filter (all of the operations returned have an operation type other than the given operation type)
        Parameters:
        opList - Operation list to filter
        opType - Operation type for the filter
        criteria - Returns all elements of the given operation type when True; returns all elements with operation type different from the opType when this is false
        Returns:
        The list of operations from the input collection which meets the criteria given to the method
